title: 3.16.4.0更新来了
author: 无名人
txt_content:
本帖最后由 无名人 于 2016-9-17 23:10 编辑 本次更新，添加了一个特别神秘的彩蛋！ 原文链接:http://store.steampowered.com/news/?appids=304930 有错误欢迎指出 添加项 Added Soulcrystal achievement/puzzle/easter egg. 添加了Soulcrystal(灵魂水晶)/谜题/彩蛋 Added ability to place buildables in the level editor. 地图编辑器添加了放置建筑的能力 Added precision in-game building for camera mode. [Default F6] 游戏内添加了精密的建筑相机模式 [默认F6] Added Ramp Walls. [IDs 1414-1418] 添加了斜坡墙壁 [ID:1414-1418] Added config options for hint and full server descriptions. 配置选项添加了提示和完整的服务器描述 Accepted several new curated workshop items. 接受了一些新的饰品创意工坊物品 优化项 Improved stairs/ramps not to have top edges so they are more useful. 优化了楼梯/斜坡的顶部没有边缘，使他们更有用 调整项 Tweaked server description to use sign formatting and "
" for newlines. 调整了服务器描述使用牌子的格式和"
"换行 修复项 Fixed firstperson gun/melee to create matching world lights. 修复了第一人称中的枪支/近战武器与世界光照配合创造 Fixed chandeliers and ornate street lights using light halos. 修复了吊灯和装饰大街上的路灯使用光晕 Fixed hyper zombies to use emissive textures for eyes. 修复了亢奋状态的丧尸的眼睛使用发光材质 Fixed exposed holes in undersides of several bridges on Russia. 俄罗斯地图修复了几座桥的底部露出了洞口 Fixed paintballgun barrel spawning instead of Russian beret. 修复了彩蛋枪枪管生成而不是生成俄罗斯贝雷帽 Fixed refreshing players in server info screen. 服务器信息屏幕修复了刷新玩家 Fixed syncing saved shipping containers open state when connecting. 连接服务器的时候修复了同步保存海运集装箱的打开状态 Fixed holstered weapons when dragging directly from nearby items. 修复了直接拖动武器的时候会拖动附近的物品 Fixed duping items with item display storage. 修复了储存物品类容器显示复制物品 Fixed mannequin obstruction bounding box. 修复了服装模特阻塞包围盒 Fixed decaying buildables that were placed in the future. 修复了在被放置后的未来一些建筑腐烂的问题
